channel.title: websocket on Memo Tut
channel.description: Recent content in websocket on Memo Tut

item.title: [Python] A story that analyzes the delivery of Nico Niko.
item.description: #Introduction I’m a VTuber Marginal Geek. In December, “Virtual to Live” was held at Ryogoku Kokugikan, and it was also streamed live by Nico Nico. I couldn’t even go to the field and even see them in real time, but I couldn’t wait until the disk came out. That’s why I bought an online ticket and saw the time shift. Well, than expected. I wanted to save it until I could not see the time shift, so I started analyzing Nico Niko with Python.

item.title: [Python] I saw you not working
item.description: #Introduction There are people who smash without working in a club activity, so it is a story that I can always see the state of the club room. With OpenCV and WebSocket, I was able to easily create what I could see in real time. I will leave it. Operating environment CentOS Linux release 7.5.1804 Python 3.6.8 Logitech Webcam C270 Implementation Install the following pip install opencv-python pip install flask pip install gevent pip install gevent-websocket Directory structure â”œ main.

item.title: [Python] Let's create a web chat using WebSocket with AWS serverless (Python)!
item.description: This article is the second day of NTT Technocross [Advent Calendar 2019](https://qiita.com/advent-calendar/2019/ntt-tx). Hello. My name is Yasuda. I am in charge of new AI-related product development at NTT Technocross. It’s a gap from the main subject immediately, but drawing a manga is a recent break, and I’m drawing the following manga. Data link understood by manga Enterprise architecture in the AI era understood with manga IT strategy understood by manga … Well, in this article, I’d like to see how to do “WebSocket” without AWS server.
